newsdata.description: An officer assigned to Gujarat election duties has paid heavily for his posts on Instagram. Abhishek Singh, an IAS (Indian Administrative Service) officer, was removed by the Election Commission for apparently flaunting his posting on Instagram, sour
newsdata.title: "Publicity Stunt": Bureaucrat In Trouble Over Gujarat Poll Duty Insta Post - NDTV
